column4: As a user; I want to authenticate using my Google .
As a user; I want to authenticate using my GitHub account.
As a user; I want to stay authenticated across multiple devices so that I can access my account anywhere.
As a user; I want to log out from my account .
As a user; I want to explore the landing page so that I can understand the platform's features and benefits.
As a user; I want to create a new project so that I can organize my diagrams.
As a user; I want to view my projects.
As a user; I want to update project details so that I can keep information current.
As a user; I want to delete a project.
As a user; I want to download project diagrams as images in a compressed ZIP file.
As a user; I want to share my project with others.
As a user; I want to create a new diagram.
As a user; I want to view my diagram.
As a user; I want to update diagram details.
As a user; I want to delete a diagram.
As a user; I want to edit diagram code in an interactive editor.
As a user; I want to chat with an AI model to edit diagram code.
As an AI system; I need to respond to user requests and help edit diagram code.
As a PlantUML Server; I need to render diagram code into diagram images.
As a user; I want to explore the community.
As a user; I want to comment on projects.
As a user; I want to like/unlike projects.
As a user; I want to share projects.
As a user; I want to update my comments.
As a user; I want to delete my comments.
As a user; I want to like/unlike comments.
As a user; I want to copy community projects to my workspace.
As a user; I want to edit my profile.
As a user; I want to view public projects on profiles.
